_header: Whoso him liketh these verses to read
_description: Praise of London inserted in Fabyan’s Chronicle — two eight-line stanzas

HarEng766.Transcription:
Who soo hym likith these verses to RedeWith ffavour I pray he will
                    them spellLett not the Rudenes of them hym ledeffor to disprave this
                    Ryme dogerell……This Citie to prayse in eche degreAs it
                    shuld duely Ask of right
